casebody.data:
Union County
v.
Town of Marshville No. 411P16 Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 26, 2017 Karlene Scott Turrentine, Attorney at Law, Warrenton, for Town of Marshville. S. C. Kitchen, Attorney at Law, Durham. J. Daniel Bishop, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Union County. Scott A. Hefner, Attorney at Law.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 7th of November 2016 for Writ of Supersedeas of the judgment of the Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 26th of January 2017."
